text: A longer beginner’s dialogue today to help push your Chinese along.Work through slowly.妈妈：小红，你能帮我一下吗？小红：你想要什么帮助？妈妈：我的新帽子丢了，你能帮我找一下吗？小红：好的，你看看是不是在厨房里，我看下是不是在客厅里。两分钟以后。。。小红：我找到了！你的帽子在沙发下面。妈妈：谢谢你！Mother：Xiao Hong, can you help me for a moment?小红：What help do you want?Mother：I have lost my new hat, can you help me find it?小红：Ok, you see if it is in the kitchen, I will look in the living room.Two minutes later…小红：I’ve found it! Your hat was under the sofa.Mother：Thank you!1 – 什么东西丢了？a. 裤子b. 帽子c. 袜子d. 内裤2 – 帽子丢在哪里？a. 沙发上面b. 沙发旁边c. 沙发下面d. 沙发里面1. b2. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
